name: BubbleSort
description:
Bubble Sort is an early prototype build for a hyper casual phone game.
You can play by swiping at any line or column to move every ball on that same line.

There's an Android version build available if you want to try it on your phone.

I'd like to gather as much feedback as possible to help me decide if I should keep going with this project so any kind word is welcome.

Thank you for playing.

Current roadmap :

- Graphics and Animations rework.

- Audio, SFX and Sound design

- Score visual feedback enhancements and score animations

- Non random generation for enhanced game experience

- Leaderboard

- Finding a proper name

- Puzzle mode ?
